nodes.text: Star Wars Galaxies Update was a recurring feature in West End Games' Star Wars Gamer magazine focusing on the then-upcoming MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies.

Issue 3 included an interview with concept artist Arnie Jorgensen. The interview included concept art, and the magazine created entries for those characters for the roleplaying game, including Shayl Le'tah, Nogget, Nabat Valla, and a krayt dragon.
